title: As a User, I want MJCs to read the Primary Legal Entity from the MJ Club Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN multiple Legal Entities have been added to an MJ Club Profile 
AND  one of these Legal Entities is listed as Primary
AND an MJC has been created for a player for this MJ Club
custom_steps: WHEN user prints MJC for a player from this club
custom_expected: THEN Legal Entity displayed on the MJC should match whichever Legal Entity is listed as "Primary" on the MJ Club Profile

title: As a Tester, I want to access the MJC API through the ebis link interface
custom_preconds: GIVEN a tester is logged in using an account with correct API credential
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "EBIS Link" screen from left nav
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a UI to select the MJC API, and to supply input parameters
AND user should also see the returned API response in a readable JSON format (with indents)
AND UI should have a basic Expand and collapse feature

title: As User, I want to be prevented from entering the same Arbitrator multiple times
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in with permissions for arbitration eligibles utility
AND user has navigated to the arb utility from left nav
AND user is viewing the hearing info modal for a player in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a name from one of the "Arbitrator" dropdowns
custom_expected:
THEN the selected name should no longer appear in subsequent "Arbitrator" dropdowns
AND user should be unable to select the same arbitrator twice on one hearing info modal

title: As a User, I want to view the Affiliate Profiles widget
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Utilities Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN "Affiliates" tab(placed in alphabetical order on the dashboard and submenu)
AND Browser tab text should say "Affiliates" 
AND Will match the provided wire and data discovery

title: As a User, I want to View a MN Affiliate Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the Affiliate Profile Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a Club Name in the Affiliate Profile Widget
custom_expected:
THEN system will open an Affiliate Profile in View Mode
AND Layout will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND Browser tab text = "Profile - Club Name"
AND Logo management will be handled in a future story
AND Address and Staff section will be handled in a separate story
AND This includes the profile header "i.e. Reno Aces - 3A Pacific Coast League"

Wireframe:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=minor_league_affiliate_profile

title: As a User, I want to View an MJ Club Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs in
AND navigated for Affiliate Profile Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user click a Major League Club's name
custom_expected:
THEN system will open the Club's profile in View Mode
AND Layout will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND Browser tab text = "Profile - Club Name"
AND Logo management will be handled in a future story

Wireframe:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=major_league_affiliate_profile

title: As a User, I want to Edit a Club Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Affiliate Profiles Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Club name to open Club profile in view mode
custom_expected:
THEN an Edit(grey) button will be available  in view mode if the viewing user has edit permissions for the form in its current state. 
AND clicking Edit will reload the form in edit mode, and a Save(grey) button will appear in place of the Edit button (no edit button displayed in edit mode).
AND Editable fields will match what is in the provided Data Discovery (Note the special behaviors)
AND A Save button will be available anytime the form is in edit mode. 
AND Clicking Save will save the form and it's current values and reload the transaction in view mode. 
AND After a successful save the system will display a successful save blue notification. See Messages #77.
AND Whenever the form is in edit mode, the user will see a "Cancel" button on the form in grey.

Wireframe:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=minor_league_affiliate_profile

title: As a User, I want to Cancel changes to a Club Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in Affiliate Profiles Widget
AND opens a Club profile in EDIT mode
AND makes changes to profile
custom_expected:
THEN system will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes they have made. 
AND If they confirm the cancellation and the form has not yet been saved in the system, then the form should be closed and no record should be kept. User should be returned to entry point Affiliate Profiles widget. 
AND If they confirm the cancellation and the form has been previously saved in the system, then the form should be reloaded in the default mode (view/edit) for the current state, with none of the edits that were made since the last save and up to the cancellation point reflected.
AND If they do not confirm the cancellation then the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

title: As a User, I want to Create a new MN Club Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Affiliate Profile Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Create New button
custom_expected:
THEN system will load a new MN Club Profile in edit mode
AND Layout will match the provided wire and data discovery (no fixed header will display until after the first save)
AND Browser tab text = "New Club"


Wireframe: http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=create_new_club

title: As a User, I want to rename a MN Club Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Affiliate Profiles Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens a MJ Club profile in VIEW mode
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a 'Rename Club' button in View Mode
AND clicking this button will open a 'Rename Club' modal
AND The modal will have the following fields:
  -- Club Name
  -- Club Nickname
  -- Abbreviation
  -- Legal Club Name
  -- Effective Date
AND The modal will be pre-populated with the values on the existing profile
AND Buttons on this modal will be 'Rename' and 'Cancel'
AND 'Rename Club' will end date (new effective date minus 1) the existing club name and create a new effective date for the club with the new name. 
AND 'Cancel' will close the modal and return the user to view mode of the profile

Wireframe:
 -http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=rename_club
 -http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=minor_league_affiliate_profile

title: As a User, I want to warned when editing a Club Name on an MN Club Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in Affiliate Profiles Widget
AND has a MJ Club profile open in EDIT mode
AND user made changes to Club Name, Club Nickname, or Abbreviation fields
custom_expected:
THEN system will check on Save for any changes made to the Club Name, Club Nickname, or Abbreviation fields.
AND If any changes have been made, an overideable warning will be displayed:
  Body: "You have modified the Club's name.  This change will affect all transactions in which this Club was involved since its effective date."
  Hint Text: "If you would like to rename this Club, please cancel your changes and use the Rename Club button."
AND The warning will have two buttons:
  -- Override
  -- Cancel
AND Override will commit the changes and refresh the screen in view mode
AND Cancel will close the warning and return the user to the form in edit mode

title: As a User, I want to Navigate to and View the Reaffiliation Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to View the Reaffiliation Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user nav to Utilities tab on the left nav
custom_expected:
THEN "Reaffiliation" option should appear under the Utilities 
Or Clicking Utilities link in the left nave will open the dashboard
AND "Reaffiliation" tabs should appear in alpha order
Or Users can also go directly to the Reafilliation utility by clicking on the Reafilliation link in the utilities left nav flyover menu
AND on the Reaffiliation tab the browser tab should say "Reaffiliation"
AND the layout of the Utility should match the provided wireframe
AND The fields should match the provided data discovery

Wire:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_reaffiliation

title: As a User, I want to add a Reaffiliation
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Reaffiliation Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user enters Effective Date on the Reaffiliation Utility
custom_expected:
THEN system will activate the Continue button
AND Clicking the Continue button will load a new (blank)  Reaffiliation block
AND The layout will match the provided wires and data discovery

Wire:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_reaffiliation

title: As a User, I want to add multiple Reaffiliation blocks
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Reaffiliation utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters effective date and clicks continue button to display Reaffiliation blocks
custom_expected:
THEN there will continue to be an 'Add Reaffiliation' button on the screen when Reaffiliation blocks are displayed
AND clicking the button will add a new (blank)  Reaffiliation block
AND the layout will continue to match the provided wires and data discovery
AND there is no limit to how many blocks may be added

Wire:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_reaffiliation

title: As a User, I want to delete a Reaffiliation block
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Reaffiliation utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters effective date and clicks continue button to display Reaffiliation block(s)
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a trashcan icon located within each Reaffiliation block, as depicted in the provided wire
AND Clicking the trashcan icon will delete the respective block.
AND Clicking the trashcan icon will trigger the "Are you sure modal"
AND Clicking 'Yes' deletes the block and the user is returned to the utility
AND Clicking 'No' dismisses the modal and the user is returned to the utility

Wire:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_reaffiliation

title: As a User, I want to go Back from entering Reaffiliations
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Reaffiliation utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters effective date and clicks continue button
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Back button on the Enter Reaffiliations screen
AND clicking the button will trigger the "Are you sure modal"
AND clicking 'Yes' removes any reaffilation blocks entered and the user is returned to their point of entry (either create new club screen or effective date screen)
AND Clicking 'No' dismisses the modal and the user is returned to the utility

Wire:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_reaffiliation

title: As a User, I want the formatting of Club Nickname and Abbreviation to be consistent
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user in Reaffiliation Utility
custom_steps: WHEN Club Nickname and Abbreviation is being entered
custom_expected:
THEN Club Nicknames should be camel case (First Letter Of Each Word Capitalized)
AND Abbreviations should be in all CAPS
